/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking up towards the towering buildings that line the street. These structures are predominantly red and white, standing out against the clear blue sky. The street itself is a hive of activity, with cars and pedestrians adding life to the scene. In the distance, the tops of trees can be seen, providing a touch of nature amidst the urban landscape.
